website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Skechers GOwalk Revolution Ultra received high praises for its comfort and durability. The sock-like fit and extra cushion afforded by the pillars also pleased reviewers. Though the upper was stretchy and easy to slip on, the softness of the material meant that the side-to-side support was inadequate. There were also gripes about the durability of the outsole and the lacking arch support. However, the footgear still came highly recommended because it was a very comfortable walking shoe.
pros: Almost all of the consumers regarded the Skechers GOwalk Revolution Ultra comfortable for extended periods of standing, walking, and even working out
The width and size of the footgear were deemed perfect by many people
Numerous reviewers liked the sock-like style of the trainer because it was easy to wear and fully covered their feet
The durability of this product impressed plenty of purchasers
The cushion offered by the pillars at the outsole exceeded the expectations of multiple owners
A small number of users raved about the lightweight nature of the merchandise
cons: A minority of shoppers were dismayed that the upper of the Skechers GOwalk Revolution Ultra was too soft and did not offer lateral support
The outsole of the footwear got quickly worn out, as stated by more than a few testers
The arch support was insufficient, said a handful of buyers
A couple of commenters complained that the shoe was difficult to get on

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great for walking, but has issues
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for my standing desk. Only problem is they're really bad going up hills which I didn't buy these for anyway. The heel could definitely be more supportive. When driving its not comfortable, like the back of the shoe has a gap between the sole and it starts to pinch a bit. First pair I ordered was way too large for an 11.5 and I returned for an 11, which is now tight. I think the first pair was just mislabeled. Pretty good shoe but I wouldn't buy these again. I love the bottom of the shoe and would try another GoWalk series for sure.
customer_reviews.author: RadGH

customer_reviews.title: My brand is gonna be Sketcher LOVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love, these shoes have a blessing on them. I didn’t want laces like my other sketchers but because of the sock effect of the form of the shoe you can slip in an out regardless!! So I have been running jumping an more in these and I’m thoroughly impressed! This is th second pair of sketchers I’ve bought that have blown my mind. Lol So I think I’ve found my brand.
customer_reviews.author: MiahJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and bouncy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and a pair for me specifically to be worn in Disneyland and at work. They're great! Very soft and bouncy. Probably my favorite pair of skechers and I've gone through about 20 pairs. I work 12 hour days at the hospital so these help with my tired achy feet. I wish the foam lasted longer but I guess that's the trade off for wanting soft squishy foam. I end up buying a new pair about twice a year
customer_reviews.author: Cang

customer_reviews.title: Super cushioned shoes!
customer_reviews.text: What people are saying about this is true. It feels like there's a piece of yoga mat glued to the bottom of the shoes. I have had them for almost 11 months now and they still do. Unfortunately they don't last long as the cloth on the side started to rip as in the picture. I'm going to try their new version, the Go Walk Ultra Jolt and see they have fixed this. Really great shoes nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Lantern

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Had to return unfortunately. These are a sock style shoe with unremovable insole. I need to be able to insert my orthotic inserts, so i had to return. However, its an awesome looking shoe and should perform well for most people. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Newguy

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable Skechers out of 6 other models
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 other models of Skechers, but these are the most comfortable. They just feel right. Like they were made by elves ) It's like a whole new level of comfort! Though, they are not "maneuvrable" like all-leather indoors sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Popov

customer_reviews.title: seriously like walking on yoga mats all day so soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: seriously like walking on yoga mats all day so soft and springy good lord are these comfortable. very soft sole i am curious to see how long these last for, i use them for hospital work.
customer_reviews.author: caleb

customer_reviews.title: These are sooooo comfy and cool already bought another pair in Black probably with buy ...
customer_reviews.text: These are sooooo comfy and cool already bought another pair in Black probably with buy a third in another color and the price is on point, delivery was really really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Virg

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: WOW !! I am a shoe whore I have many sketchers and other brands these are by far the most comfortable shoe on Earth. I wish they had more colors and maybe more detailed stitches and stuff on shoe so it does not just look like a sock with laces
customer_reviews.author: MRBILL

customer_reviews.title: Different size than what wrote in ( size chart )
customer_reviews.text: Usually I like sketchers shoes but this one they wrote at size chart that (11.5 us ) is ( 45.5 Europe size ) but it come ( 11.5 us size) and ( 45 Europe size ) and I live in Middle East so I can’t return it back Cause it will cost me double price Too much disappointed
customer_reviews.author: romeo

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Men's Go Walk Sneakers Are Like A 2nd Pair Of Socks
customer_reviews.text: These Skechers are very light weight. They fit my feet like gloves. The soles did feel a little different from other sneakers that I have worn in the past. Actually these Skechers Go Walk Sneakers feel like I am wearing a 2nd pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last very long, not durable for a walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The sole is still like new but the top has ripped away from the sole. I received these "WALKING" shoes for walking my dog. After 3 months the sides of the left shoe are ripping. And since it was sold by Amazon I have no return rights after 1 month. So they can sell crappy products with no warranty. From now on I will buy things like this from a real store that will stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Art Rinner

customer_reviews.title: Too tight around ankle
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are crazy hard to get your foot into them. Don't even think about wearing socks. I wore them without socks and walked 3.5 miles. Foot felt great after wards except socks would've helped.
customer_reviews.author: John Moss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes with roomy toe box. I use it for walking, not running. Perfect. Comfortable, not flashy. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my go walks they are perfect I have paralysis and drop foot in my left leg and the shoes are perfect they feel like they’re massaging my feet every time I walk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing comfort. This was one of my favorite shoes. The comfort these shoes offer is outstanding bit after light wear the fabric seperated from the sole of the shoe. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: victor galloway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall great shoe!!!! Runs somewhat larger than the other Skechers I have purchased in the past....
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Davis II

customer_reviews.title: Sole fell apart and came unglued.
customer_reviews.text: They won’t stand up as work shoes for someone who hustles back and forth. The soles orange parts popped off within 2 weeks of tough walking in a retail environment.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Holland

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the Go Walk 3
customer_reviews.text: Wore them three times, then tossed them in the clothing recycling bin.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support in the heel and midsole cushioning.
customer_reviews.text: Super light I find the uppers too soft. Heels has min support. Midsole is too soft
customer_reviews.author: Samson C

customer_reviews.title: the shoe is roomy and comfortable. The shoe is also light and feels more ...
customer_reviews.text: The opening to insert your foot is narrow. I have a high instep and had trouble. Once on, the shoe is roomy and comfortable. The shoe is also light and feels more like a slipper than a regular shoe. I decided to keep it because it is attractive and useful for light walking.
customer_reviews.author: George D.

customer_reviews.title: no quality
customer_reviews.text: After two months of wear, shoe fell apart at seams. The "refund" link to return is no longer active. Shoes were very comfortable but they need to last longer than two months.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi P.

customer_reviews.title: Skrunchy shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap shoe. The tip of it skrunches together. I can’t really explain it, it’s just poorly made. It is comfortable. But poorly made
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put on. Too small. Gave away the pair.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Different shoes. Feels like your floating on air and adds a spring to your step..
customer_reviews.author: r flores

customer_reviews.title: Different fit from other Skechers!
customer_reviews.text: Sent back, very small for size and didn't like the fit.
customer_reviews.author: desert reader

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ,perfect for hiking
customer_reviews.text: A little tight around ankles, you better wearing it without socks on Wonderful for walking, don't running with it in case of spraining
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as always, but not at all durable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable as other Skechers shoes, but they aren't a bit durable. I ordered the shoe, and it tore from one of the sides in the first 15 days. I asked for a return, got one, but in another 45 days the shoes are torn and I don't whether I should buy Skechers again, coz this is not what I expect as a customer from a brand as good as Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and soft until the orange parts come off
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and soft until the orange parts come off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maziar

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Cushioned sections on the sole of the shoe have detached after only a couple of months of sporadic use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tore
customer_reviews.text: After wearing the shoes for about 3 weeks the upper tore away from the lower on left shoe back close to the heel. I loved the way it fit and the design. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the most comfortable shows I've ever owned...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel like walking with padded paws beneath your feet - very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Milt

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel or everyday sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: The best pair of light weight everyday sneakers I’ve ever owned. Super comfortable. Like walking on a cloud. Feels like wearing a comfy sock with a cushy bottom
customer_reviews.author: CRR

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: had to return to big for me, could not get smaller size for same price, nice shoe
customer_reviews.author: Rafael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe I would buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes ... Maybe the most comfy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Mahmoud Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my Amazon Prime new Sketcher Go Walks today with someones disgusting sole inserts in the shoes. Very disappointed in this entire Amazon Prime experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after a week
customer_reviews.text: Havent had the shoes a week and the tread is coming apart already !!
customer_reviews.author: Peddler's Pawn

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Shoes started to rip after a few months of wear
customer_reviews.author: Stone5150

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs. I wear it for just 2 months & the quality was so poor that it started tearing near the sole. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price adjustment within 30 days ?
customer_reviews.text: the shoes fit ok . is there adjustable price within 30 days?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skechers Go Walk Revolution Ultra Men's Black Multi
product_meta.description: The Go Walk Revolution Ultra by Skechers is more supportive than your average shoe. This shoe is perfect for people with an active style. Whether your life involves walking, jogging, or being on your feet frequently, this shoe will support you. Robust fabric combines with heavy-duty manmade sole to ensure a long lifespan for your favorite everyday-wear shoes. Built to support and cushion your feet all day long, their strategically engineered design with extra comfort assures you that no matter what the day throws at you, you can take it and keep going.
feature_bullets: Skechers high-rebound air cooled Goga Mat insole
